item.description:
Come to the opening, meet Ron and see his new art show .  Liquid Light is a series of images that Ron Created by Photographing models wearing light to create patterns of color.  

Artist Statement: I walking through a building supply store and a display of rope light caught my eye, I’ve seen it used many times before, to light deck rails and under bars, but this was different.  I just finished doing a fashion shoot and when I saw the rope light an idea just popped into my head.  Why not combine the rope light with a model.  So the experiment of shooting lights began.  I dressed the model with the rope light, turned off the studio lights and began experimenting with model movement, shutter speed, exposure and zooming the lens while the shutter was open.  The concept was to create fashion forms without showing the apparel.  I’ve been shooting fashion and beauty for most of my life so commercial advertising photography is second nature. This is a new path, shooting as though it’s a fashion shoot but creating art, not an ad campaign.  It’s incredibly exciting to watch the image appear on the monitor in an otherwise dark studio.  I’m now experimenting with different types of light that can be attached to a model and giving the model more freedom in movement.   It’s like a dance of light.  

Ron is represented by Canvas Fine Arts.
